text: FIRS may refer to: *FIRS (index), a share index of the Banja Luka Stock Exchange *The Firs, now the Chancellors Hotel & Conference Centre, in Manchester, England *Fédération Internationale de Roller Sports, the International Federation of Roller Sports *Forensic Investigation Research Station at Colorado Mesa University *Forum of International Respiratory Societies, a respiratory health advocacy organization *FIR, an aviation acronym for Flight Information Region, which designates airspace == See also == * FIR (disambiguation)
title: FIRS
